articles.description: The net worth of Pakistan’s richest person Shahid Khan, who is the owner of Flex-N-Gate, is just USD 12 billion, which is nothing when compared to Mukesh Ambani's wealth.

articles.title: Indian athletes no pushovers on world stage anymore, says AFI president - The New Indian Express
articles.description: The Athletics Federation of India has named a 28-member team, a heady mix of young and experienced athletes across multiple track and field events.
